ComicInfo.Title: A Stillness and a Storm
ComicInfo.Summary: A Stillness and a Storm: Green Arrow arrives in Smallville to free the humans being kept captive for the vampires to feed on. Steel, Black Manta, and Jayna attempt to help Supergirl reach Australia where they believe her powers can be restored, but they are confronted by Aquaman, who is now a vampire. Batgirl, Black Canary, Harley Quinn, and Frankenstein attempt to get into Gotham where they plan to take out the king of the vampires, Dick Grayson.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-22 21:09:44. [CVDB949027] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 21:48:39. [Issue ID 2435208]
